Thanks for the torrent, Pippin. I actually used a search to find this particular Item---Now if I can find "Smell the Glove," I'll be able to settle in for a few good chuckles.
As one who spent plenty of time on te road along with my well known ex; the first time we watched it, she asked me to turn it off half way through. She was afraid of busting a gut! After almost 20 years at the time) of playing clubs, composing, and touring (inckuding 1 world tour) the schtik was every thing that could happen to a touring band, happens in this movie.
I happen to remember the 60's and 70's atmosphere well!! I'm probably the only one here that would rate thisflick a 10+
Thanks again Pippin.
P.S. Thanks for snagging the great Bio from Amazon AND giving the proper credit! KUDOS!!

Good quality no complaints other than the best part is missing. The film actually extends beyond that credits to reveal the funniest part. Unfortunately I didn't read the comment below and I have to be disappointed in myself.
